mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM comment_t WHERE BNUM=#{bnum}
SELECT * FROM comment_t WHERE BNUM=#{bnum} ORDER BY cwritedate DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO comment_t(CNUM, BNUM, CWRITER, CCONTENT, CWRITEDATE) VALUES((SELECT NVL(MAX(CNUM),0)+1 FROM comment_t), #{bnum},#{cwriter},#{ccontent},default)
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM comment_t WHERE cnum = #{cnum} and cwriter=#{cwriter}
